sentences.en: A sudden gust of cool wind under the slaty sky, and rain drops will start patter - pattering.
sentences.cn: 在灰沉沉的天底下, 忽而来一阵凉风,便息列索落地下起雨来了.

sentences.en: And I got some patter with the capital gains tax , too.
sentences.cn: 我也能侃侃而谈投资利得所得税.

sentences.en: And improved effect is confirmed by SEM picture on patter cross section.
sentences.cn: 由图形结构的断面SEM照片验证了这项工艺的实际改善效果.

sentences.en: As I ponder that image, we are startled by a thumping patter behind us.
sentences.cn: 正当我想像那光景时, 我们忽然被后面一阵啪答啪答的沉重声吓了一跳.

sentences.en: At length a pitter - patter , pitter - patter, and some bits of mortar fell from the wall above.
sentences.cn: 过了很久,一阵劈劈啪啪, 劈劈啪啪的声响后有一些水泥从上面的墙掉下来.

sentences.en: Don't always patter yourself on others. Make something your own.
sentences.cn: 不要总是去模仿别人, 做出你自己的特色来.

sentences.en: Fran began her automatic patter about how Jon had been unavoidably detained.
sentences.cn: 弗兰开始不由自主地唠叨起乔恩是怎样无可避免地被扣留的。

sentences.en: Growth cite and patter can be identified from CT manifestation.
sentences.cn: 胸部CT可准确反映原发病变的部位和生长方式.

sentences.en: He heard the patter of Libby's feet approach the phone.
sentences.cn: 他听到利比踢里挞拉的脚步声跑来接电话.

sentences.en: I had given up hope of &B{hearing the patter of tiny feet}.
sentences.cn: 我已经放弃了生孩子的希望。

sentences.en: Pebble finished paper: Paper with a pebbled patter added after making or sometimes after printing.
sentences.cn: 卵石纹纸: 造纸后或间中在印刷后在纸上加上卵石纹理的纸.
就在这时,噼噼啪啪的雨点落了下来.

sentences.en: She can't wait for the patter of tiny feet.
sentences.cn: 她巴不得婴儿早日出生.

sentences.en: She missed the pitter - patter of little feet around the house.
sentences.cn: 她怀念小脚在房子里四处走动时发出的卜卜声.

sentences.en: We found the goods did am # 39 ; t agree with the original patter.
sentences.cn: 我们发现货物与原式样不符.

sentences.en: You have to learn to resist the sales patter.
sentences.cn: 你可得学乖点,不要轻信推销员的那套话.

words.tran_cn: 行话；轻快脚步声；急速拍打声
喋喋不休地说；使…发出嗒嗒声

phrases.tran_cn: (幽默)[用于指有孩子或即将生孩子]踢小脚的巴嗒巴嗒声

trans.tran_cn: 黑话，行话，嗒嗒声，快板，顺口溜，急速拍打声
trans.tran_en: the sound made by something as it keeps hitting a surface lightly and quickly

trans.tran_cn: 滴答地响；急速地说；发出急速轻拍声
trans.tran_en: if something, especially water, patters, it makes quiet sounds as it keeps hitting a surface lightly and quickly

trans.tran_cn: 滴答地响，急速地说，发出急速轻拍声
（雨点）嗒嗒地下，嗒嗒地跑，叽叽喳喳地念，喋喋不休
